column3: US-421S/Wilkinson Blvd between Schenkel Ln and US-460/E Main St in Franklin Co:
column4: All southbound lanes shutdown until further notice.  Serious collision involving a pedestrian.

column3: I-75/I-71 at Brent Spence Bridge (Cincinnati Area):
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
